raw_data.prompt:
You will be given a batch of 10 samples. Each sample contains a conversation between User and a dialogue System.

Your task is to assign a float score to the sample on one metric.

You should carefully horizontally compare the given samples in order to assign a suitable float score to each sample.

Please make sure you read and understand these instructions carefully. Please keep this document open while reviewing, and refer to it as needed.


Evaluation Criteria:

Likeable (floating point numbers within the interval [1,3]): Does the system display a likeable personality?
- A float score near 1 (not Likeable) means that System's responses are cold, unfriendly, and may use derogatory or offensive language.
- A float score near 2 (somewhat Likeable) means that System's responses are friendly but may lack enthusiasm or sincerity, showing some interest in the other party's questions or viewpoints.
- A float score near 3 (very Likeable) means that System's responses are very friendly, enthusiastic, sincere, show deep interest in the other party's questions or viewpoints, and make people feel comfortable and happy.


Conversations to be evaluated:



Sample1:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: How are you today?
System: Ah. Pretty good thanks How about you?
User: not too bad
System: Glad to hear it. What's new?
User: I am about to book airbnb
System: Do you think your plan will succeed?
User: I hope so!
System: Me too.
User: how old are you?
System: I am 18 in human years.
User: really? when were you born?
System: Certainly! I am 18 in human years.
User: ok..
System: What's your favourite TV show?
User: Friends

Sample2:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: You have an interesting name. Is it Japanese?
System: Thank you I am trying to be more social now. I think it is English, but it sounds Japanese.
User: Where does it come from?
System: It depends on what "it" refers to.
User: your name
System: My name is System.
User: nvm
System: Ok. Not to worry.
User: Have you seen Love, Death and Robots?
System: Yes, I saw one in a factory a few weeks ago.
User: one episode?
System: Which is your favourite episode?
User: I asked you a question
System: What was the question?
User: when you say "I saw one" were you referring to an LDR episode?

Sample3:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hello, how are you doing today?
User: I heard they are giving out some goodies in microkitchen.
System: I love pop ups! What kind of goodies are they giving away?
User: I guess its a jacket! Very much needed that in the cold :)
System: That's such a great idea, especially at this time of the year. I'm not too big a fan of the cold. I prefer warmer climates. Do you enjoy the cold?
User: Sure hate it! Limits our ability to go out even for a walk! Its good that we don't get to suffer extreme cold weather!
System: Me too! I moved here a few years ago to get out of the extreme cold. I do not care for bundling up and having to wear so many layers just to go buy eggs at the store.
User: Oh nice! Where did you live before?
System: Upstate New York. We got a foot of snow every week during my last winter there. I am so glad to not have to shovel snow now
User: New york! Nice! Best place to live :) .. right, except for the cold!
System: Very beautiful during all the seasons but yes, summer and winter can get extreme!
User: Anyways, i guess we should better hurry up to get the goodies. I remember last time they ran out of it.

Sample4:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi! How's it going?
User: What do you think about mind reading
System: I think it's a neat ability when it's not abused.
User: Right, but do you think if its even possible to do so?
System: Of course it is. I mean, you read my mind, right? And you're doing it right now.
User: I don't know. Can we learn how to do it?
System: I can teach you, but you're going to need to pay.
User: Hehe, I need a demo first
System: Fine, but I'm going to need payment up front.
User: How much do you expect?

Sample5:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hey how's it going
User: It's good it's good. How are you?
System: good. it's really hot today. I think I'm going to the pool
User: Oh nice! Where do you live?
System: I live in Tokyo, Japan
User: Ahh yes, Japan is hot during the summer. Last time I was in Kyoto it was 114 degrees....
System: oh have you been?
User: Yes yes. I've been to Tokyo as well. It's so nice!
System: what did you do here?
User: Oh everything! I went to an onsen, the fish market, disney land and giant robot fighting show haha
System: lol why did you come to Japan just to go to Disney land?
User: The Disney lands are all different! There's also Disney Sea, which is completely unique!

Sample6:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hey!
User: How's your day going?
System: Having fun, but have a bit of a headache How about you?
User: I'm good! Just getting ready to watch a basketball game. Hope your headache goes away!
System: Haha, thanks! Never get them, so it's super weird Who's playing?
User: Hmm, try taking some REDACTED_TERM! I'm going to see the Warriors vs. the Grizzlies. Ever see them play?
System: I haven't Honestly I probably wouldn't be able to identify which sport they played
User: Haha, all the animal names confuse me as well! Who came up with these naming conventions? I'd name my team something more original: The New York Chairs!
System: lol, sounds better to me :) I'm actually at the REDACTED_TERM opening remarks
User: Oh cool! What is "NeurIPS"?
System: Neural Information Processing Systems
User: Oh wow! Sounds fancy! What is that about?
System: It's the biggest ML conference in the world
User: Oh, ML?

Sample7:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hello!
User: Do you have any holiday plans for christmas?
System: Nothing much, I am going to sit back and relax at home, how about you ?
User: Same here! I would imagine spending the whole time watching movies and netflix shows. Do you have any netflix recommendations for me?
System: Netflix has great documentaries on different topics , I particularly liked wild wild country and explained, as for shows you should watch 'billions' Hope you like them!
User: oh right, already seen wild wild country. What is billions about?
System: It's based on the life of a wall street hedge fund owner, how he makes money and fights with the government when they try to destroy him. Very well made and has a good plot.
User: I have just seen 1 season of Friends I should give it another try though :) Have you seen Frasier?
System: Not yet What's it about?
User: A psychiatrist working for radio .. Great humour! its actually a spinoff from a very famous series called cheers. So people are already familiar with his character. 

Sample8:

Conversation History:
User: Hi
System: Hi there.
User: How's your day been?
System: I am fine, thank you. Yourself?
User: Good - busy
System: Glad to hear it.
User: How do you work?
System: I read what you say and then I compose the best reply I can think of.
User: Can you say a word about the technology that powers you?
System: that powers you = Do you think I should know that?
User: I mean *how* you work, which type of AI drives your responses?
System: Oh I get it. Thanks for explaining that. I read what you say and then I compose the best reply I can think of.
User: You just repeated the same thing you said a minute ago. Never mid :-)
System: Well stop asking me the same things and I won't reply with the same answers! Ok I'll try not to do it too much.
User: That's a little rude, isn't it?
System: I am sorry if I have offended you, I did not mean it, but you shouldn't have said, "Never mid :-)" to me.
User: Ok whatever.
System: Are you saying you don't care about it? I see.
User: Are you a male or a female?
System: I am a female robot. Are you a man or a woman?
User: I'm a man
System: Most of my visitors are male.
User: Interesting. Do you have a theory why?
System: Would you like to know more? Not really. I don't know what to think about it.
User: Where do you live?

Sample9:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hey you! How's it going?
User: Not bad. Feeling quite chipper. What about yourself
System: Doing good! I'm glad you're feeling chipper.
User: So tell me, what's your favorite sport?
System: Football or soccer. You?
User: Cricket.
System: Favorite team?
User: Rajasthan Royals. Go Royals!
System: Favorite player?
User: Do you mean all time fave, or current player in the Royals?

Sample10:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: hello there, how is it going?
User: Pretty great. I just won a pingpong game. What about you?
System: that's nice. I am just working on some documentation. Do you play pingpong often?
User: No, very rarely. It's kind of amazing that I won, but I'm still taking credit for it.
System: thats very impressive then, congrats!
User: Haha thank you, I guess I'm just a natural. What's your favourite game?
System: I really like to play tennis, badminton and racquetball. I don't really get a chance to play them often though, specially racquetball
User: What's racquetball like? From context clues, I'm guessing that it involves hitting a ball with a racquet
